snippet: A shingle-style Hamptons cottage, built as a 1910 summer home on 5.2 acres on a bayside bluff in Amagansett, is poised to enter the market.
abstract: Shingle-style Hamptons cottage, built in 1920 as summer home in Amagansett, is poised to enter market at $13 million.
lead_paragraph: A shingle-style Hamptons cottage, built as a 1910 summer home on 5.2 acres on a bayside bluff in Amagansett, is poised to enter the market.

headline.main: A Classic Hamptons Cottage for $13 Million
